Hello! Welcome


I am Dasun, a student and a computer enthusiast.

I am interested in computer oriented stuff and love to learn and work with emerging technologies. Nowadays, I spend most of my time in researching web technologies, and I am really enjoying it. In addition to these things, I always love to experiment with electronics specially with Arduino whenever I have a free time.

In this website I hope to share my thoughts, experiences, codes and things I am excited about.

Now you know a bit about me. Feel free to have a look at my website and don't hesitate to contact me if you are really interested.

Thanks for reading.

Education

  • B.Sc. (Special) in Computer Science (University of Sri Jayewardenepura) (Reading)
  • Bachelor of Information Technology (University of Colombo School of Computing)
  • Sun Certified Java Programmer (SCJP)
  • Sun Certified Web Component Developer (SCWCD)
